definition: Whitman (surname)/Walt Whitman (1819-1892), American poet and journalist
surname Hui
favor/benefit/to bestow/(literary) benevolence/(honorific)
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
handsome/large/long
Walt Whitman (1819-1892), American poet, essayist and journalist
pinyin: Wo4 er3 te4 · Hui4 te4 man4

sentences.english: "We discussed how we would do the trade, " says Wittman.
sentences.chinese: “我们讨论了如何交易，”惠特曼说。

sentences.english: 'We need to be in the tablet business, ' Ms. Whitman added.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼补充说，我们需要进军平板电脑业务。

sentences.english: Whitman was cleared of the conflict by the EPA inspector general.
sentences.chinese: 环境署监察长使惠特曼从以权谋私的指责中得以开脱。

sentences.english: Wittman calls this "the moment of acceptance."
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼称此为“接受的时刻。”

sentences.english: The Whitmans bought it three weeks ago for $224,500.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼夫妇在三周前以224，500美元买下它。

sentences.english: Hui Teman is considered as the inaugurator of Euramerican and free verse.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼被认为是欧美自由诗体的开创者。

sentences.english: At any rate they have nothing to do with the extraverted Whitman of legend.
sentences.chinese: 无论如何，这和传说中性格外倾的惠特曼并无关系。

sentences.english: Whitman assured the public that the air was safe before testing was conclusive.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼向公众保证在测试下结论之前空气是安全的。

sentences.english: Others aren't given that option by the thieves, says Wittman.
sentences.chinese: 而其他艺术品盗贼则不会给出这种选择，惠特曼说。

sentences.english: In the early and middle years of his life, Whitman was obscure and rarely visited.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼早年和中年时一直默默无闻，问者寥寥。
或者读惠特曼与埃罗特？

sentences.english: Wittman is always part of a team.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼总是团队的一部分。
“他总是坐立不安，”惠特曼回忆。

sentences.english: This is Whitman's for-real next big gig.
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼这次可是要真刀真枪地再大干一场。

sentences.english: In fact, while Rometty does have a tech background, Whitman does not.
sentences.chinese: 事实是罗梅蒂有此方面的文凭，惠特曼没有。

sentences.english: At the heart of Wittman's job is what he calls "befriending and betraying."
sentences.chinese: 惠特曼工作的核心就是他所说的“结交和背叛。”
